text: The Optare Prisma was a single-decker body of a bus. It had a step-entrance. It was made from 1995 to 1998 by Optare. The Prisma body was built to the Mercedes-Benz O405 chassis. In 1998, It was replaced by the low-floor Optare Excel. ==References== ==Other websites== Prisma
title: Optare Prisma
